allow: Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d postgres -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE datname = ''sports_management'' AND pid <> pg_backend_pid();")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS sports_management;")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE sports_management;")
